item.description:
We're going to meet at Fruitlands at 102 Prospect Hill Rd off rte 110 in Harvard MA at 11AM Sunday May 27th. There is Alcott House used by Bronson Alcott and other transcendentalists, Shaker Museum, Indian Museum, and Picture Gallery. This was an experimental community started in 1843. Admission is $10 unless you're over 60($8)...We can eat here and talk. The museums are set on rolling green hills with a view of Mt Wachusett and surrounded by woods with nature trails.
If anyone wants to carpool please let me know.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Fruitlands
